title: Augmented Reality-Based Science Learning: Customized Design for Cognitive Load Profiles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and ability to use smart devices
context.additional_context: Non-degree course for working professionals focusing on scientific concept exploration and problem-solving skills enhancement using AR technology

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain their cognitive load profiles in AR-based science simulations.
Learners can explain over 70% of science concepts with accuracy using personalized AR learning strategies based on their profiles.
Learners can analyze differences between profiles through group activities and design collaborative learning scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
